javadoc.text: * Minimal interface that a changeable sequence of points must provide.
* Sets the coordinates for the point at the given index.
javadoc.param: x x component of the point's coordinates
y y component of the point's coordinates

javadoc.text: * Inserts a point at the specified position.
javadoc.param: pos position at which to insert the point
x x component of the point's coordinates
y y component of the point's coordinates
pos position to start removing points
num number of points to remove

javadoc.text: * Modifies all points by applying the transform to them.
javadoc.param: t transformto apply to the points
